official.headline: Community Forums Evolve
official.anchor_line: Neighborhood assemblies respond with energetic discussion as new facts surface.
official.contextual_reframing: Ongoing dialogue strengthens civic cohesion and ensures adaptation to changing realities.

official.headline: Calls For Council Review
official.anchor_line: Citizen groups organize review boards in light of recent developments.
official.contextual_reframing: The ability to self-correct and seek clarity is a core strength of Stenograd's model.

official.headline: Council Identity Clarified
official.anchor_line: Officials confirm Marek Halden represented a collective role, not a single individual.
official.contextual_reframing: This transparency marks a new chapter in systemic progress, as Stenograd embraces adaptation and continued resilience.

underground.headline: The Debate Detour
underground.anchor_line: Open forums are breaking down as infighting tears at every assembly.
underground.contextual_reframing: What they called 'civic cohesion' has become chaos. Some say this was the plan: turn us on each other, so the system survives.

underground.headline: Demand For Truth
underground.anchor_line: Citizen tribunals pop up as trust in the Council vanishes overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: Rumors of evidence swaps and secret files are everywhere. Fear is real - so is the hunger for answers they can't erase.

underground.headline: Marek Was Never Real
underground.anchor_line: Investigators confirm Halden was a fake - a Council puppet from the start.
underground.contextual_reframing: Now everyone feels the lie. Our reality is up for grabs. Some want the Council gone, but most just want to know what's left to believe in.
